content: these crochet radish carrot and pea appliques will make a beautiful embellishment for your kitchen items towels potholders placemats or napkins you can use them to decorate your market bag or you can make a crochet veggies garland you can also embellish your kid s items to remind them to eat their veggies free versions of these patterns are available on my website https //www goldenlucycrafts com/crochet-carrot-radish-pea-vegetables-applique/ by purchasing this listing on etsy you will receive the pattern in a print-friendly styled and advertisement-free pdf file format
